name: Militia Strike Multiplayer
description:
Hi guys this is a idea game that how I convert my singleplayer Militia Strike game into multiplayer. I am using Unity Engine 2018 with Unet + Noble Connect plugins.

The game is not polished, however it have some cool features, there are a few bugs in the game too.

Features:-

Player Movement

Player Shooting

Health System

Death and Respawning

Features that can be added soon:-

ScoreBoard and some bug fixes.

Controls
  • WASD for moving
  • Space for jump
  • Left Mouse Button(LMB) for shoot
  • Installation

Open your Militia Strike.zip file and drag the Militia Strike folder to somewhere on your computer. Now open your new Militia Strike folder and start the game.

For people getting the "There should be 'Militia Strike Multiplayer_Data' folder next to the executable" error on windows: Make sure you extract the game by dragging the Militia Strike Multiplayer folder from the Militia Strike Multiplayer.zip file to somewhere on your computer. Now open your NEW Militia Strike Multiplayer folder and start the .exe file.
